Title: Tabula Rasa
Plot: Under Samuel?s guidance, Sylar starts on a path to rediscover his true identity. Hiro helps Emma accept and understand the great possibilities that go along with having an ability. Meanwhile, Peter enlists HRG to help him find a healer who can save Hiro?s life.
GuestStars: Ellen Greene, Deanne Bray, Ray Park, Dawn Olivieri, Carlease Burke, Mark L. Young, Jayma Mays, Ernie Hudson
